Sinopse: This period war-drama showcases the 1897 Battle of Saragarhi. The plot focuses on Havildar Ishar Singh, who led a platoon of 21 Sikhs against an invading army of 10,000 Afghans to defend the North-West Frontier Province. The event is considered one of the greatest last-stands in history.—beingdhruvnanda
